metadata.title: CVE-2023-48183 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
QuickJS before c4cdd61 has a build_for_in_iterator NULL pointer dereferencebecause of an erroneous lexical scope of "this" with eval.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-48183` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libquickjs - 2024.01.13-4
quickjs - 2024.01.13-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: quickjs package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2024.01.13-4').
